Customer Reviews FAQs

Learn more about our reviews and how we maintain our 5-star rating

How can I leave a review for Ez2Fix?

We appreciate your feedback! You can leave a review on Google, Yelp, or Facebook. After your service, we'll send you links to make it easy. Your honest feedback helps us improve and helps others make informed decisions.

Are these reviews verified and authentic?

Yes, all reviews displayed are authentic from real customers. We do not post fake reviews. Our reviews come from Google Business Profile, Yelp, and other verified platforms.

What do I do if I have a complaint or negative experience?

We take all feedback seriously. Please contact us directly at (201) 554-6769 so we can address your concerns promptly. We're committed to making things right and ensuring 100% customer satisfaction.

Why should I trust Ez2Fix with my garage door repair?

Our 5-star reviews speak for themselves. We're licensed, insured, offer 10-year warranties, provide upfront pricing, and have served hundreds of satisfied Northern NJ homeowners. Read our reviews to see what your neighbors say.

Do you respond to customer reviews?

Yes, we read and respond to every review. Whether it's a 5-star review or constructive feedback, we value hearing from our customers and use feedback to continually improve our service.

Can I request references from previous customers?

Absolutely! In addition to our online reviews, we're happy to provide references from recent customers in your area. Just ask your service coordinator when scheduling.
